name: 酒心巧克力
Wine Chocolate
des: 一种经典的糖果，甜美的外表下，包裹着醉人的香醇。
A classic candy, sweet appearance, wrapped in a drunken sweet.

name: 空心巧克力
Hollow Chocolate
des: 看上去和普通巧克力完全一样，但酒心的部分已经抽空了。
Looks exactly the same as ordinary chocolate, but the wine heart part has been hollowed out.

name: 巧克力
Chocolate
des: 普通的巧克力，可以作为食物或者材料。
Ordinary chocolate, can be used as food or material.

name: 巧克力蛋糕
Chocolate Cake
des: 被甜甜的巧克力包裹着的蛋糕，看上去很诱人。
A cake wrapped in sweet chocolate, looks very tempting.

name: 钉子
Nail
des: 一根普通的钉子。
A common nail.

name: 铁锭
Iron Ingot
des: 一块普通的铁锭。
A common iron ingot.

name: 废木料
Waste Wood
des: 一些废弃的木料，只能用来生火。
Some discarded wood, can only be used to make fire.

name: 纸张
Paper
des: 一张普通的空白纸张。
A common blank piece of paper.

name: 毛巾
Towel
des: 一条素色的普通毛巾，能给你带来一点安全感。
A common plain towel, can give you a little of comfort.

name: 破布
Rag
des: 一条破烂的布料，可以用来包扎伤口。
A ragged piece of cloth, can be used to bandage wounds.

name: 杯子
Cup
des: 一个普通的木杯子，可以用来装水。
A common wooden cup, can be used to hold water.

name: 金属零件
metal components
des: 一个金属制的零件，可以用于制作。
A metal components, can be used to craft.
